carl.abr.IO

Class Sensors_listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • carl.abr.IO.Sensors_listener

  • public class Sensors_listener
extends java.lang.Object
    Listener used to interact with sensors of the phone. Only one listener is used for multiple sensors (compass, gyroscope, accelerometer).
    Once registered with the SensorManager, the function onSensorChanged(SensorEvent) will be called every time a sensor has been updated.

        public float[] get_orientation()
        Returns the orientation (compass values) of the device in local X, Y and Z axis, in degrees.
        Returns:
        the orientation as a: float[3] (azimuth, pitch and roll).

      • get_gyro_values

        public float[] get_gyro_values()
        Returns the rate of rotation around the device's local X, Y and Z axis. In degrees/s.
        Returns:
        the rate of rotation as a: float[3].

      • get_azimuth_90

        public float get_azimuth_90()
        Returns the Azimuth of the phone when oriented 90 degrees on its side (landscape mode).
        Azimuth: angle between the magnetic north direction and the y-axis, around the z-axis (0 to 359: 0=North, 90=East, 180=South, 270=West).
        Returns:
        azimuth (float) in degrees
